name: snippets-library
author: Steve Simkins
description: A modern, full-stack code snippet manager for developers

scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:shared" "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:client"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd server && bun run start:prod" "cd client && bun run preview"
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server && bun run build:client
scripts.postinstall: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server
